mapper.sql: u.id as u_id, u.real_name as u_real_name, u.username as u_username, u.password as u_password, u.portrait as u_portrait, u.salt as u_salt, u.email as u_email, u.phone as u_phone, u.create_by as u_create_by, u.create_date as u_create_date, u.update_by as u_update_by, u.update_date as u_update_date, u.remark as u_remark, u.del_flag as u_del_flag
mapper.select:
select
from sys_user u
u.del_flag = '0' and
u.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user ( id, real_name, username, password, portrait, salt, email, phone, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remark, del_flag) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{portrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into sys_user
id,
real_name,
username,
password,
portrait,
salt,
email,
phone,
create_by.id,
create_date,
update_by.id,
update_date,
remark,
del_flag,

mapper.update:
update sys_user
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
portrait = #{portrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_user set real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, portrait = #{portrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
